entry.title: Pack N Wood - Palm Leaf Mini Bowl/Plate 6 Oz - 25 / Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pack N Wood
Type: Disposables
Price: 15.99

Serve your culinary creations in this disposable  sustainable palm leaf bowl.

120mm 4.7" x 25mm 1" x 200ml / 6Oz

  • Dia:5.05in H:1.2in

The Palm Leaf Mini Bowl/Plate is made from eco-friendly palm leaf, which is a renewable resource that doesn’t adversely impact the environment. It is filmable, microwaveable up to ​​​​​​​​356°F​​​​​​ and biodegradable bowl that is perfect for mini appetizers and desserts, such as bread pudding. Its 6 ounce capacity makes it a versatile small bowl for restaurants, hotels, food trucks, and food festivals. You can safely put hot and cold foods into it without worry that the bowl will crumble or sag under the weight.

 

  • COMPOSTABLE
  • DESIGNED FOR COLD
  • DESIGNED FOR HOT
  • GREASE RESISTANT
  • MICROWAVE SAFE
  • OVENABLE
  • RECYCLABLE

    •  

     

     

    • • 6 ounce capacity 
    • • 4.7” diameter size
    • • Microwavable up to ​​​​​​​​356°F​​​​​​​​
    • • Biodegradable palm leaf bowl
    • • Hot and cold food safe bowl

    If you want the convenience of disposable dinnerware without the harm to the environment, this eco sustainable palm leaf get the job done. These are durable enough for use with both hot and cold foods, and when customers are finished eating, they can simply throw it away. This feature keeps you from having to wash as many dishes in your establishment, saving you time and water.

    Made with Eco-Friendly Materials

    It is made with all-natural palm leaves, ensuring they are completely compostable. Using it will keep plastic and other harmful materials out of landfills, and your environmentally-conscious customers will appreciate it.

    Environmentally-Friendly Look

    It is more upscale than paper or plastic and features a distinctly environmentally-friendly look. Your customers will know this bowl is green just by looking at it.


    Durable Construction

    It is made for use with both cold and hot foods, and it won't leak or drip like paper will. This durability will save you from having to double up on when serving hot food.

entry.title: New Wave - Clear Lid For 8" Square Bagasse Plate - 50/Sleeve
entry.summary:
Vendor: New Wave
Type: Disposables
Price: 30.99

New Wave - Clear Lid For 8" Square Bagasse Plate - 50/Sleeve

Promote environmental friendliness with this Clear Lid For 8" Square Bagasse Plate !

Designed to fit Square Bagasse Plate, this lid is the perfect solution for delis, markets, and salad bars. Not only is it made from plant-based starches to give your venue an eco-conscious edge, it can withstand temperatures up to 200 degrees Fahrenheit, making it perfect for your signature sides, and pasta dishes.

Crisp, Clear Color

This lid has a crisp, clear color to give your soup cups a pleasing presentation every time.

Tight-Fitting Design

The tight-fitting design allows it to snap onto compatible cups for easy, leak-proof transport.

Promotes a Sustainable Planet

This lid's durable construction ensures quality, single-service use. Since it's compostable, it can help divert waste from landfills, effectively reducing pollution and promoting a more sustainable planet.

Convenient and Cost-Efficient

A cost-efficient addition to any establishment, this lid provides your customers with a convenient way to enjoy your soups on the go!

entry.title: MC - 6" Round Bagasse Sugarcane Biodegradable Plate - 1000/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: SmartChoice
Type: Disposables
Price: 53.99

Biodegradable Compostable Bagasse Round Plates 

Serve entrees and shared platters on this sugarcane / bagasse round plate.

If you're looking for the convenience of disposable products without the environmental impact of plastic or foam, look no further than the compostable sugarcane / bagasse round plate. Perfect for both hot and cold foods, this plate is an ideal solution for quick-serve restaurants, caterers, and cafes.

Eco-Friendly Construction

Made from bagasse, a by-product of sugarcane processing, this product is compostable, which allows you to decrease your carbon footprint. While other disposable products are burned when thrown away causing air pollution, this can be renewed and recycled. In addition, this dinnerware is made with superior strength and won't break or crack under moderate pressure. It can even handle the messiest of menu items thanks to its oil proof design.

Wide Rim

Thanks to a wide rim, you can serve saucy foods on this plate without worrying about spills and messes.

Bright White Appearance

With a bright white color, this plate will fit almost any restaurant decor and theme while creating a clean and fresh canvas for any type of food.

Superior Alternative

This sugarcane / bagasse item takes up less storage space than other disposable alternatives, and it can hold heavier foods than either paper or Styrofoam. Plus, since it requires much less energy to produce, it saves on both energy and resources.

entry.title: Ecopax - PP091 - 9" Round Microwavable Pebble Plate Ivory - 400/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ecopax
Type: Disposables
Price: 36.99

Microwave Safe, Grease Resistant, Recyclable Poly propylene PP, Ideal for Hot Food.

Item #: 
PP091
1-Comp, Pebble Box Plates
Size: 
9 inch
Color: Ivory
The Pebble Box™ take-out containers and plates are made with earth mineral, which reduces the amount of plastic material needed by 40%. This significant reduction in plastic results in smaller environment footprint. Pebble Box and Plates are durable, grease-resistant, microwaveable and best of all – recyclable!
